pages.text: Gorillas are big neutral mammals that can be found in Jungles. You will see them in big groups, with a Silverback leading the troop.$(br2)Silveback Gorillas also have more health and deal more damage than regular Gorillas.$(br2)If a player stares at a Silveback Gorilla too long, it will initiate a bluff charge as an intimidation tactic.
Gorillas are tamed with Bananas, just drop Bananas on the ground.

Tamed Gorillas do not follow the player, however they can be commanded to sit by right-clicking on them and transportable with a lead.$(br2)If attacked, Gorillas with help you with your enemies especially Silverbacks, are efficient at defending you due to their sheer strength.
